column2: Attempt to misappropriate money or resources through theft, dishonesty or creative accounting.
Seek a title, with all the attendant powers and privileges it confers.
Plot to discredit this character, thereby reducing their [[img:icon_reputation]][[/img]]reputation.
Spread positive messages about this character in an attempt to bolster their [[img:icon_reputation]][[/img]]reputation.
Attempt to improve this character's [[img:icon_fealty]][[/img]]fealty, making them more well-disposed toward you and your aims.
Plot to have this character assassinated, ensuring that they are no longer a threat to your faction.
Request the privilege of accompanying another, more experienced character so that you may gain experience from their exploits.
Request this Faction Leader to join your faction and form a confederation.
